mdRecord.dcterms:title: Visitors in Upper Garden
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Trueblood, Dorothy - likely
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of Lowell Trueblood, Wilma Trueblood, Sue Trueblood, Sally Trueblood and Mike Trueblood posing in the Upper Garden at Mount Vernon. Photograph likely by Dorothy Trueblood. At far right is a glimpse of the newly constructed greenhouse nearing completion (windows missing), Summer 1951. Top border of photograph has a deckle edge.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Upper garden
